# How to Contribute

We have opportunities for students in epidemiology, social sciences, political science, international relations, and related fields. We are looking for students interested in contributing to the project during the upcoming academic year.

If you have a research idea that aligns with the goals of the project, are interested in working with us, or would simply like more information, please contact us at:
[contato@projeto-dourados.org](mailto:contato@projeto-dourados.org).
